question: The original landmass, pangola split into
option1: Laurissa in the north and Godwanaland in the south
option2: Laurissa in the south and Godwanaland in the north
option3: Laurissa in the east and Godwanaland in the west
option4: Laurissa in the west and Godwanaland in the east
answer: Laurissa in the north and Godwanaland in the south
